summary:
Compliance/ Finance Professional with broad international experience mainly in the Upstream Oil Industry. Currently I hold Global Ethics & Compliance responsibility for the Upstream Businesses. I have gained front line experience in the set-up of a Kazakhstani JV Finance structure. As Finance PMO member of the RDS Divestment program I contribute to the decision making of the overall divestment program.  
I easily build relationships based on common understanding and mutual respect. I have a track record in building various, international teams that deliver on promise, on time with high quality. I’m energetic, results driven, commercial astute and pragmatic. I remain resilient under pressure.
